== Setting Regulatory Domain For Zyxel WiFi adaptor ==

  * Run:
  {{{
  iw reg set ZA
  }}}

== Start B.A.T.M.A.N. ==

  * Run
  {{{
  killall -9 NetworkManager
  killall -9 nm-system-settings
  ip link set wlan0 down
  iwconfig wlan0 mode ad-hoc 
  iwconfig wlan0 channel 13
  iwconfig wlan0 essid afrimesh
  ifconfig wlan0 172.30.1.x/24
  batmand wlan0
  }}}
